description:
Kelly® is seeking a Manufacturing Training and Development Manager for a direct-hire role with an electrical manufacturing company in Monrovia, CA. This opportunity is perfect for those looking to align their career with their lifestyle.

Responsibilities

The Training and Development Manager is responsible for designing, implementing, and managing effective training programs to enhance the skills, knowledge, and productivity of employees in the manufacturing plant. This role involves working closely with department heads to identify training needs, developing training materials, and ensuring that all training initiatives align with company goals and regulatory requirements.

    • Design and develop training programs, materials, and resources tailored to the needs of the manufacturing workforce.
    • Collaborate with department managers to identify specific training needs based on job roles, performance goals, and regulatory requirements.
    • Create and implement onboarding programs for new employees to ensure they are equipped with the necessary skills and knowledge.
  • Training Delivery:
    • Conduct training sessions using a variety of methods (e.g., classroom, e-learning, hands-on, simulations) to accommodate different learning styles.
    • Coordinate with external trainers or consultants as needed to deliver specialized training.
  • Program Management and Evaluation:
    • Monitor and assess the effectiveness of training programs through evaluations, feedback, and performance metrics.
    • Adjust training content and delivery methods as necessary to ensure continuous improvement.
    • Maintain accurate records of training activities, employee progress, and certification statuses.
  • Compliance and Safety Training:
    • Ensure that all training programs comply with industry regulations, safety standards, and company policies.
    • Develop and deliver mandatory safety training programs to ensure a safe working environment.
    • Keep up-to-date with changes in safety regulations and industry standards, updating training programs accordingly.
    • Identify and develop potential future leaders through targeted training and mentoring programs.
    • Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Organizational Development, Education, or a related field.
    • 5+ years of experience in training and development, preferably in a manufacturing environment with high voltage electrical experience.
    • Strong understanding of manufacturing processes and industry-specific training requirements.
    • Bilingual in Spanish a plus
    • Salary: $130k+ a year
    • Schedule: Monday-Friday 8am-5pm/ 7am-4pm 100% onsite

    Next Steps

    Apply today! If it’s not the right fit, we’ll keep you in our network for future opportunities. Contact Daisy at 562-471-7322 or email your resume to daid740@kellyservices.com.

As a Kelly employee, you will have access to a retirement savings plan, service bonus and holiday pay plans (earn up to eight paid holidays per benefit year), and a transit spending account. In addition, employees are entitled to earn paid sick leave under the applicable state or local plan.
